effect.relicthespire.thorns.description: Deal damage to attacker when attacked with direct damage
relicthespire.effect.min_damage: Damage you inflict will not be lower than %s
relicthespire.item_lore.anchor: Holding this miniature trinket, you feel heavier and more stable.
relicthespire.item_lore.art_of_war: This ancient manuscript contains wisdom from a past age.
relicthespire.item_lore.bag_of_marbles: A once popular toy in the City. Useful for throwing enemies off balance.
relicthespire.item_lore.bag_of_preparati: Oversized adventurer's pack. Has many pockets and straps.
relicthespire.item_lore.blood_vial: A vial containing the blood of a pure and elder vampire.
relicthespire.item_lore.bronze_scales: The sharp scales of the Guardian. Rearranges itself to protect its user.
relicthespire.item_lore.burning_blood: Your body's own blood burns with an undying rage.
relicthespire.item_lore.centennial_puzzl: Upon solving the puzzle, you feel a powerful warmth in your chest.
relicthespire.item_lore.ceramic_fish: Meticulously painted, these fish were revered to bring great fortune.
relicthespire.item_lore.cracked_core: The mysterious life force which powers the Automatons within the Spire. It appears to be cracked.
relicthespire.item_lore.damaru: The sound of the small drum keeps your mind awake, revealing a path forward.
relicthespire.item_lore.data_disk: This disk contains precious data on birds and snakes.
relicthespire.item_lore.dream_catcher: The northern tribes would often use dream catchers at night, believing they led to self improvement.
relicthespire.item_lore.happy_flower: This unceasingly joyous plant is a popular novelty item among nobles.
relicthespire.item_lore.lantern: An eerie lantern which illuminates only for the wielder.
relicthespire.item_lore.oddly_smooth_sto: You have never seen something so smooth and pristine. This must be the work of the Ancients.
relicthespire.item_lore.orichalcum: A green tinted metal of an unknown origin. Seemingly indestructible.
relicthespire.item_lore.pen_nib: Holding the nib, you can see everyone ever slain by a previous owner of the pen. A violent history.
relicthespire.item_lore.potion_belt: I can hold more Potions using this belt!
relicthespire.item_lore.preserved_insect: The insect seems to create a shrinking aura that targets particularly large enemies.
relicthespire.item_lore.pure_water: Filtered through fine sand and free of impurities.
relicthespire.item_lore.red_skull: A small skull covered in ornamental paint.
relicthespire.item_lore.ring_of_the_snak: Made from a fossilized snake. Represents great skill as a huntress.
relicthespire.item_lore.smiling_mask: Mask worn by the Merchant. He must have spares...
relicthespire.item_lore.snake_skull: A snecko skull in pristine condition. Mysteriously clean and smooth, dirt and grime fall off inexplicably.
relicthespire.item_lore.the_boot: When wound up, the boot grows larger in size.
relicthespire.item_lore.toy_ornithopter: "This little toy is the perfect companion for the lone adventurer!"
relicthespire.item_lore.vajra: An ornamental relic given to warriors displaying glory in battle.
relicthespire.special.potion_belt_desc: May hold %s kinds of potion and %s of each kind
relicthespire.special.potion_belt_use: When you use potions, refill with the same potion in the belt
relicthespire.tooltip.elite: Enemies with base max health between %s and %s counts as elite
relicthespire.trigger.first_attack: For first attack in combat mode:
relicthespire.trigger.nth_attack: For every %s attack in combat mode:
